glsa.title: dhcpcd: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been found in dhcpcd, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on the DHCP client.

background.p: dhcpcd is a fully featured, yet light weight RFC2131 compliant DHCP client.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in dhcpcd. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: The vulnerability might allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the DHCP client.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All dhcpcd users should upgrade to the latest version:
